channel.title: Bug Discovered in Quantum Algorithm for Lattice-Based Crypto
channel.description: A bug in Yilei Chen's quantum algorithm for solving LWE has been found, temporarily securing lattice-based cryptography and highlighting the need for ongoing research.

image.title: Bug Discovered in Quantum Algorithm for Lattice-Based Crypto

item.author: contact@sebastienrousseau.com (Sebastien Rousseau)
item.description: A bug in Yilei Chen's quantum algorithm for solving LWE has been found, temporarily securing lattice-based cryptography and highlighting the need for ongoing research.
